mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE (ATTENDANCE_ID, ATTENDANCE_DATE, CLOCK_IN, CLOCK_OUT, STATUS, USER_ID) VALUES(seq_attendance_id.nextval,sysdate,systimestamp,null,5,#{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET CLOCK_OUT = systimestamp WHERE ATTENDANCE_DATE BETWEEN to_date(to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT min(a.ATTENDANCE_DATE) AS "attendanceDate", m.USER_ID AS "userId", a.attendance_id AS "attendanceId", a.status AS "status", a.clock_in AS "clockIn", a.clock_out AS "clockOut" FROM attendance a, members m WHERE a.attendance_date BETWEEN to_date(to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 and a.user_id = m.user_id and a.user_id=#{userId} GROUP by a.user_id , m.user_id, a.attendance_id, a.status, a.clock_in, a.clock_out order by a.attendance_id asc ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT ATTENDANCE_DATE AS "attendanceDate", CLOCK_IN AS "clockIn", CLOCK_OUT AS "clockOut", STATUS AS "status", RNUM+1 AS "seq" FROM ( SELECT ATTENDANCE_DATE, CLOCK_IN, CLOCK_OUT, STATUS, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT ATTENDANCE_DATE, CLOCK_IN, CLOCK_OUT, STATUS FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY ATTENDANCE_DATE DESC ) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) AS "count" FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND status = 0
SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) AS "count" FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND status = 2
SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) AS "count" FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND status = 1
